oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William Henry Olds Hodge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: William Henry Olds Hodge was a member of Company I, Kansas Cavalry. He was born Willliam Henry Olds on November 5, 1843, in Ravenna, Ohio, and he took the name of his stepfather, Jonah J. Hodge, when he enlisted in the Union Army. He was married to Mary Averella C. Linsley and had five children.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
